T04n2980u_001:150: tebhyas ta eva na bhavanti kutaḥ parebhyo
T04n2980u_001:154: dvābhyāṁ na cāpi kuta eva vinaiva hetum |
T04n2980u_001:164: tasmād dhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij
T04n2980u_001:168: jātasya janma punar eva ca naiva yuktam || 6.8
T04n2980u_001:183: bījasya ca prabhava eva bhaved bhavāntaṁ
T04n2980u_001:187: tenaiva tasya hi kathaṁ ca bhaved vināśaḥ || 6.9
T04n2980u_001:206: āpadyate yadi tadāsya kathaṁ hi tattvam || 6.10
T04n2980u_001:213: bījād ananya iha te yadi cāṅkuraḥ syād
T04n2980u_001:217: gṛhyeta naiva hi sa bījam ivāṅkurākhyaḥ |
T04n2980u_001:221: gṛhyeta vā tad api nāma yathāṅkuro 'yaṁ
T04n2980u_001:225: tattvāt tayor iti na caitad ato 'bhyupeyam || 6.11
T04n2980u_001:236: naṣṭe 'pi paśyati yataḥ phalam eṣa hetau |
T04n2980u_001:240: tasmān na tattvata idaṁ na ca lokataś ca
T04n2980u_001:244: yuktaṁ svato bhavati bhāva iti prakalpam || 6.12 (2)
T04n2980u_001:257: janyasya caiva janakasya ca karmaṇaś ca
T04n2980u_001:261: kartuś ca janmani bhavet svata iṣyamāṇe |
T04n2980u_001:265: aikyaṁ na caikyam anayor iti nābhyupeyaṁ
T04n2980u_001:284: sarvasya janma ca bhavet khalu sarvataś ca
T04n2980u_001:295: śakyaṁ prakartum iti kāryam ato niruktaṁ
T04n2980u_001:299: śaktaṁ yad asya janane sa paro 'pi hetuḥ |
T04n2980u_001:307: chālyaṅkurasya na tathā ca yavāditaś cet || 6.15
T04n2980u_001:314: iṣṭā yathā na janakā na ca śaktiyuktā
T04n2980u_001:326: no śālibījam api tasya tathā paratvāt || 6.16
T04n2980u_001:333: asty aṅkuraś ca na hi bījasamānakālo
T04n2980u_001:356: dṛṣṭe yathā na khalu naiva samānakāle |
T04n2980u_001:364: yady ekadā tad asad atra vinaikakālam || 6.18
T04n2980u_001:371: janmonmukhaṁ na sad idaṁ yadi jāyamānaṁ
T04n2980u_001:379: iṣṭaṁ tadā katham idaṁ tulayā samānaṁ
T04n2980u_001:383: kartrā vinā janir iyaṁ na ca yuktarūpā || 6.19
T04n2980u_001:398: anyatvam asti yadi kiṁ bhavanena satyāṁ
T04n2980u_001:402: nāsyāḥ satītvam atha ced vihito 'tra doṣaḥ || 6.20
T04n2980u_001:409: janyaṁ paraṁ ca janayej janakaḥ sa hetuḥ
T04n2980u_001:413: sad vātha cāsad ubhayaṁ vigatadvayaṁ vā | (3)
T04n2980u_001:426: sac cet kim asya janakair asato 'pi kiṁ tair
T04n2980u_001:430: dvaite 'pi taiḥ kim atha kiṁ vigatadvaye taiḥ || 6.21
T04n2980u_001:438: yuktyā kim atra khalu varṇitayā kriyeta
T04n2980u_001:442: lokaḥ sthitaḥ svadṛśi yena mataḥ pramāṇam |
T04n2980u_001:446: lokaś ca nāma parataḥ parabhāvam eti
T04n2980u_001:503: satyaṁ hi tal lokata eva śeṣaṁ
T04n2980u_001:556: satyaṁ tayā khyāti yad eva kṛtrimam |
T04n2980u_001:589: tat tattvaṁ ity evam ihāpy avaihi || 6.29
T04n2980u_001:600: syāl loka evety aparaiḥ kim āryaiḥ |
T04n2980u_001:608: mūḍhaḥ pramāṇaṁ na hi nāma yuktaḥ || 6.30
T04n2980u_001:657: saty aṅkure bījam ato na naṣṭam |
T04n2980u_001:684: yuktaṁ na caitan na tato 'sti bhāvaḥ || 6.34
T04n2980u_001:714: svasmāt parasmāc ca na janma yuktam |
T04n2980u_001:765: nocchedinas te na ca śāśvatāś ca
T04n2980u_001:856: na vetti yas taṁ prati deśaneyam |
T04n2980u_001:864: skandhā ime vā khalu kevalāś ca || 6.43
T04n2980u_001:945: bāhyaṁ vinā grāhyam udeti sac ca
T04n2980u_001:960: svapne yathā ced idam eva cintyam |
T04n2980u_001:964: svapne 'pi me naiva hi cittam asti
T04n2980u_001:983: yathā mayā dṛṣṭam iti smṛtis te
T04n2980u_001:998: nāsty asti vai mānasam eva cetaḥ |
T04n2980u_001:1013: bāhyo yathā te viṣayo na jātaḥ
T04n2980u_001:1025: cittaṁ ca sarvaṁ trayam apy alīkam || 6.51 (7)
T04n2980u_001:1046: mṛṣā padārthā na tad asti cittaṁ
T04n2980u_001:1095: jñeyaṁ vinā syād yadi nāma buddhis
T04n2980u_001:1107: syād eva na tv evam ato 'sti naitat || 6.55
T04n2980u_001:1118: yatas tato dhīr na hi jāyate 'sya |
T04n2980u_001:1204: tato na doṣā iti sādhyam etat
T04n2980u_001:1322: svapne tathāsann iti kiṁ na vetsi || 6.66
T04n2980u_001:1369: vastu kvacin nāma sad ity uśanti || 6.68
T04n2980u_001:1407: syād eva bodho na mṛṣā ca tat syāt || 6.70
T04n2980u_001:1426: jñeyaṁ yathā nāsty api dhīs tatheti || 6.71
T04n2980u_001:1494: smartuḥ paratvaṁ na hi me 'sti yasmāt |
T04n2980u_001:1498: tato mayā dṛṣṭam iti smṛtiḥ syād
T04n2980u_001:1546: kiṁ nāma yenāsya na vetti sattvam || 6.77
T04n2980u_001:1599: tayor vibhāgaṁ na paraiti yo vai
T04n2980u_001:1790: rūpam asti khalu yady api tasya
T04n2980u_001:1794: kartṛtā tu na hi cittavad asti |
T04n2980u_001:1851: na dravyaṁ te yāti siddhiṁ niṣiddham |
T04n2980u_001:1872: yatrāpy uktaṁ nāsti dṛśyaṁ bahir vai
T04n2980u_001:1884: rūpaṁ tebhyas tac ca neyārtham ehi || 6.94
T04n2980u_001:1937: sūtraṁ buddhvā nīyatāṁ yan na tattvaṁ
T04n2980u_001:1948: dvābhyāṁ na cāpi jananaṁ khalu yuktarūpaṁ
T04n2980u_001:1952: doṣāḥ patanti vihitās tuta eva yasmāt |
T04n2980u_001:1956: na lokato 'pi na ca tattvata iṣṭam etad
T04n2980u_001:1967: hetuṁ vinaiva yadi janma bhavet tadānīṁ
T04n2980u_001:1979: lokaś ca saṁgraham ayaṁ khalu naiva kuryāt || 6.99
T04n2980u_001:1986: gṛhyeta naiva ca jagad yadi hetuśūnyaṁ
T04n2980u_001:2005: bhūtāni tāni na hi nāma tathātmakāni
T04n2980u_001:2017: lokaṁ paraṁ sa katham eṣyati samyag eva || 6.101 (13)
T04n2980u_001:2049: bhūtāni tāni na hi santi yathā tathoktaṁ
T04n2980u_001:2058: āhetukaṁ ca khalu yena purā niṣiddhaṁ
T04n2980u_001:2062: bhūtāny amūny anuditāni na santi tasmāt || 6.103
T04n2980u_001:2073: janmāsti hetum anapekṣya ca naiva yasmād |
T04n2980u_001:2081: lokasya tena viṣayāḥ khalu bhānti mithyā || 6.104
T04n2980u_001:2107: mohaṁ pratītya yadi karma vinā na mohād
T04n2980u_001:2111: bhūtaṁ tad ity abudha eva pareti nūnam |
T04n2980u_001:2119: vidvāṁs tu śūnyam avagacchati mucyate ca || 6.106
T04n2980u_001:2126: na tattvataś cet khalu santi bhāvās
T04n2980u_001:2145: keśādayas te na hi nāma jātā
T04n2980u_001:2172: paśyasy ajātān yadi tat kathaṁ te
T04n2980u_001:2176: tulye 'py asattvena tu tan na yuktam || 6.109
T04n2980u_001:2239: yatas tato nāsti sad eva janma || 6.112
T04n2980u_001:2395: kleśāṁś ca doṣāṁś ca dhiyā vipaśyan |
T04n2980u_001:2545: dravye vṛttau vaiparītyaṁ ca na syāt || 6.127
T04n2980u_001:2571: na syād doṣaḥ santatis tattvataś ced
T04n2980u_001:2579: skandhā nātmā nāpi cittaṁ ca tasmād
T04n2980u_001:2602: skandhāś cittaṁ vā bhaven nāta ātmā || 6.130
T04n2980u_001:2647: rūpaṁ nātmā vedanā no na saṁjñā
T04n2980u_001:2674: no nāthatvaṁ no damaḥ sākṣitā vā
T04n2980u_001:2740: syāt kartāsan karma cāstīti ced dhīr
T04n2980u_001:2744: no kartāraṁ yad vinā nāsti karma || 6.137
T04n2980u_001:2835: saty anyatve syād iyaṁ kalpanā vai
T04n2980u_001:2878: rūpe nātmā rūpam ātmany asac ca |
T04n2980u_001:2905: bhedaṁ prayāti saha tair api dṛṣṭiśailaḥ || 6.145
T04n2980u_001:2954: sattvaṁ siddhaṁ svātmanā tasya mā gāḥ |
T04n2980u_001:2977: vastuny ete dve gatī nāma dṛṣṭe
T04n2980u_001:3011: na cāpy ananyo na ca nāma tadvān || (19)
T04n2980u_001:3096: vṛndaṁ na kiṁcit tava yena nāma |
T04n2980u_001:3100: na nāma kiṁcit khalu yat kathaṁ tat
T04n2980u_001:3149: na tattvato naiva ca lokataś ca
T04n2980u_001:3153: sa saptadhā yady api yāti siddhim |
T04n2980u_001:3193: yaḥ saptadhā nāsti kathaṁ tu sa syād
T04n2980u_001:3197: ity asya sattāṁ labhate na yogī |
T04n2980u_001:3315: vyavaharati jano 'yaṁ yais tathā tān pratīhi
T04n2980u_001:3319: vivadati sa munīndro yan na lokena sārddham || 6.166
T04n2980u_001:3345: janayati yadi hetur janyam evaṁ sa hetur
T04n2980u_001:3349: na janayati phalaṁ cet tadvināhetukaḥ syāt |
T04n2980u_001:3353: phalam api sati hetau jāyate yena tasmāt
T04n2980u_001:3357: kathaya bhavatu pūrvaṁ kiṁ kuto yad yataḥ
T04n2980u_001:3371: janayati yadi hetuḥ prāpya kāryaṁ tadā te
T04n2980u_001:3379: pṛthag ayam aviśiṣṭo 'hetubhiḥ syāc ca hetur
T04n2980u_001:3390: phalam atha tava hetur no karotīty ato 'sat
T04n2980u_001:3394: phalam iti phalahīno 'hetuko san na hetuḥ |
T04n2980u_001:3398: dvayam idam api māyāsaṁnibhaṁ yena tasmād
T04n2980u_001:3402: bhavati na mama doṣo laukikāḥ santi cārthāḥ || 6.170
T04n2980u_001:3413: aprāpya ceti nanu caiṣa tavāpi doṣaḥ |
T04n2980u_001:3417: svaṁ pakṣam eva vinihaṁsi vadan yadaivaṁ
T04n2980u_001:3421: dūṣyaṁ tadāsi na hi dūṣayituṁ samarthaḥ || 6.171
T04n2980u_001:3440: vaitaṇḍiko 'si ca yato 'sti na te svapakṣaḥ || 6.172
T04n2980u_001:3451: prāpyātha dūṣyam iti vā niyamena pakṣaḥ |
T04n2980u_001:3455: syāt tasya doṣa udito 'yam ayaṁ tu pakṣo
T04n2980u_001:3525: etac ca nāsti tava kevalam eva khedaḥ || 6.176
T04n2980u_001:3593: catasraḥ punar ākhyātā mahāyāne ca tā matāḥ || 6.180
T04n2980u_001:3600: cakṣur vai cakṣuṣā śūnyam asyaiṣā prakṛtir yataḥ |
T04n2980u_001:3604: evaṁ śrotraṁ mano jihvā ghrāṇaṁ kāyaś ca
T04n2980u_001:3624: rūpaṁ rūpeṇa vai śūnyam asyaiṣā prakṛtir yataḥ |
T04n2980u_001:3628: evaṁ śabdā rasā gandhā dharmāḥ spraṣṭavyam eva
T04n2980u_001:3658: sā cāpi śūnyatā śūnyā śūnyatārūpato matā || 6.185
T04n2980u_001:3687: mahattvaṁ digbhir evāsāṁ daśānām api śūnyatā |
T04n2980u_001:3698: paramārtho hi nirvāṇaṁ param etat prayojanam |
T04n2980u_001:3702: tasya yā śūnyatā tena sā paramārthaśūnyatā || 6.189
T04n2980u_001:3725: tasya yā śūnyatā tena soktā saṁskṛtaśūnyatā || 6.191
T04n2980u_001:3743: anto na vidyate yasya tad atyantaṁ nirucyate |
T04n2980u_001:3781: na tyāgo 'navakāras tu choraṇaṁ yan na
T04n2980u_001:3805: svabhāvaḥ saṁskṛtādīnāṁ yato naiva kṛtas tataḥ || 6.198
T04n2980u_001:3817: tayaiva śūnyatā tasyā yā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā || 6.199 (24)
T04n2980u_001:3830: dhātavo 'ṣṭādaśa sparśāḥ ṣaṭ tajjā vedanāś ca ṣaṭ |
T04n2980u_001:3842: śūnyatā sarvadharmāṇāṁ yā teṣāṁ tair viyuktatā |
T04n2980u_001:3903: ṣaṇṇāṁ pāramitānāṁ vai lakṣaṇaṁ kathitaṁ tv
T04n2980u_001:3911: dhyānāni cāpramāṇāni ye cārūpyāś tathā pare |
T04n2980u_001:3933: śāntatā tv animittasya duḥkhāmohas tu lakṣaṇam |
T04n2980u_001:3977: buddhasyāveṇikā dharmā daśa cāṣṭau ca ye matāḥ |
T04n2980u_001:4055: tair eva śūnyatā teṣāṁ yā soktā bhāvaśūnyatā || 6.219
T04n2980u_001:4078: prakṛtir na kṛtety evaṁ svabhāva iti kathyate 6.221
